name: solidtime
tagline: A team focused time tracking platform
description: Solidtime is a self-hosted time tracking solution focused on team productivity. It provides timesheets, reports, and project-based tracking through a modern, responsive web UI.

features.title: Project Management
features.description: Organizes time entries by projects and tasks

features.title: Team Collaboration
features.description: Monitors team member hours and productivity

features.title: Reporting
features.description: Generates detailed reports on time spent by project, user, or period

features.title: Calendar View
features.description: Visualizes time entries in calendar format for easy review

features.title: Data Export
features.description: Downloads time data as CSV or Excel for external analysis
